Brett Neumeier wrote:

> On Wed, 2004-06-30 at 16:16, Morten Grum wrote:
>  > Is there a good way of comparing/tracking consecutive junit result sets?
>  > Perhaps with a xslt style sheet for junit-report?
> 
> The best situation to be in is to have all the tests pass.  

Some people write Acceptance/Functional/Customer Tests with JUnit 
(HttpUnit, HtmlUnit...), and those don't all pass all the time.
